title: Accounting period workflow
content:
This section describes the metaphases and subordinate phases in the life cycle of an accounting period record. All transitions between phases are manually triggered.

Metaphase: Initial

Phase Transition Description
New Manual

This is the starting point for the accounting period. After an account code gets created, it enters this phase.

To make the accounting period active, manually transition it to the Open phase.

Next phase: Open

Metaphase: Active

Phase Transition Description
Open Manual

The accounting period is available for selection.

Next phase: Close

Metaphase: Inactive (End)

Phase Transition Description
Close Manual

The accounting period isn't available for selection.

Next phase: None

Related topics

  • How to create an accounting period record
  • How to edit an accounting period record
